title: vihara maanasa
sahitya:
vihAra mAnasa ramE saccidAnanda ghana shyAmE



anupallavi



ahita rAkSasa virAmE mahitanyAbhirAmE



caraNam 1



padanata jana bhava khEda vihAraNa lOlE vidhumada hara cAruvadaba

parilasuitE



caraNam 2



khara mukha vidaLa nAshanalasitE hariNa mada ghana sAra shObhita

phalE

 

caraNam 3



purandarAdi vinutE pApa ghana samIrE karuNArasa nilayE

sarasIruhanAbhE
